scripts.build:bps: emcc -O3 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s WASM=1 -I Flips --bind src/bps.cpp Flips/{libbps,crc32}.cpp -o src/wasm/bps.js
scripts.build:ips: emcc -O3 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s WASM=1 -I Flips --bind src/ips.cpp Flips/{libips,crc32}.cpp -o src/wasm/ips.js
scripts.build:ups: emcc -O3 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s WASM=1 -I Flips --bind src/ups.cpp Flips/{libups,crc32}.cpp -o src/wasm/ups.js
